Question: In the movie 'Jism 2' (2012), which of the following statements are true regarding the character portrayed by Sunny Leone?
Options:
A. Sunny Leone plays the role of a spy.
B. Izna is an adult film star.
C. Sunny Leone is an action hero in the film.

Answer: A) Sunny Leone plays the role of a spy., B) Izna is an adult film star., D) Izna is turned into a spy.
